quotes.quote: The best measure of a man's honesty isn't his income tax return. It's the zero adjust on his bathroom scale.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Where is there dignity unless there is honesty?
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Maybe coming clean is the ultimate selfish act. A way to absolve yourself by hurting someone who doesn't deserve to be hurt.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Honesty is a good thing, but it is not profitable to its possessor unless it is kept under control.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The day is for honest men, the night for thieves.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: I would rather be accused of breaking precedents than breaking promises.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Honesty pays, but it doesn't seem to pay enough to suit some people.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: If the truth doesn't save us, what does that say about us?
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When in doubt, tell the truth.
quotes.author: Mary MacCracken

quotes.quote: Level with your child by being honest. Nobody spots a phony quicker than a child.
quotes.author: Pamela Ribon

quotes.quote: When something that honest is said it usually needs a few minutes of silence to dissipate.
quotes.author: Sam Rayburn

quotes.quote: Son, always tell the truth. Then you'll never have to remember what you said the last time.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Any fool can tell the truth, but it requires a man of some sense to know how to lie well.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: An honest man can feel no pleasure in the exercise of power over his fellow citizens.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: There are only two ways of telling the complete truth--anonymously and posthumously.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Honesty is the best image.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: Our lives improve only when we take chances - and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: I have always noticed that people will never laugh at anything that is not based on truth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Every man has his fault, and honesty is his.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I thank God I am as honest as any man living that is an old man and no honester than I.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Though I am not naturally honest, I am so sometimes by chance.
